Html:
Hi-

Is it possible for the typescript compiler intellisense to provide suggestions based on typedefintion files and .js references that are not typed?

Thanks!
Jon

Not exactly sure what you're asking. We give intellisense based on the .d.ts files if they're present. Are you asking if we could also give something like a "first approximation" of the types by looking at raw .js files as well?

Jonathan

Yes!

If I am editing a typescript file which references .ts and .js files...provide intellisense for both types of files.

VS has pretty great .js intellisense already. Could the two be combined?

Thanks!
Jon
